G

Game - Class in connectFour
The class that makes the game start, progresses and stops with the correct result.
Game(Player, Player) - Constructor for class connectFour.Game
Creates a new Game with two Players Also adds an Observer to the BoardGUI
game - Variable in class server.Server
 
gameOver(int, int, PlayerColor) - Method in class connectFour.Board
Checks if the game is over, so if there is a winner or if the Board is full
gameOver() - Method in class connectFour.Game
Returns true if the game is over.
GET_LEADERBOARD - Static variable in interface utils.ServerProtocol
A message sent by a client to request the leaderboard
usage: getLeaderboard Errors: error invalidClient if sender is ingame or the sender/server does not support ServerProtocol.SEND_LEADERBOARD as provided in ServerProtocol.SEND_HELLO
